name: Firewall Configuration
description: Configuring firewalls to enhance security by restricting unauthorized network traffic.

cards.title: Firewall Fundamentals
cards.description: Understanding how firewalls work and their role in network security.
cards.bulletpoints: Stateful vs. Stateless Firewalls, Packet Filtering, Rule-Based Access Control
cards.summaryText: Grasp core firewall concepts, from packet filtering basics to crafting rule sets that hold the perimeter.

cards.title: Configuring a Next-Gen Firewall
cards.description: Implementing policies and rules for a next-generation firewall (NGFW).
cards.bulletpoints: Deep Packet Inspection, Application Layer Filtering, Intrusion Prevention System (IPS) Integration
cards.summaryText: Layer NGFW policies with DPI, app-aware rules, and IPS hooks to clamp down on modern threats.
